name: Knight by Riverside
description:
The WebGL for some reason did not include the audio in the game, so for now it is downloadable.

Please read the briefing before starting the game.

You are not able to pass the level yet, so if there are no enemies left, feel free to explore the world and just close out afterwards :)

Please fill in this short survey after having played the game: https://forms.gle/4TkXyyFjfTF3d9Dr5
